reduce_risk.description: Reduce operational and business risk from AI/ML systems

patterns.arize_solution: Production monitoring and alerting for model degradation
Drift detection and automated alerts before business impact

patterns.pain: ML performance degradation in critical systems (Ads, Trust & Safety, Search)
patterns.arize_solution: Real-time performance monitoring across model fleet

patterns.pain: No solution for RCA when production issues occur
patterns.arize_solution: Root cause analysis and troubleshooting workflows

patterns.pain: LLM hallucinations and quality issues in production
patterns.arize_solution: LLM evaluation, hallucination detection, and response quality monitoring

increase_efficiency.description: Go faster - reduce time spent troubleshooting and debugging

patterns.pain: Takes 2+ weeks to troubleshoot production issues (70% of time)
patterns.arize_solution: Automated RCA reduces troubleshooting from weeks to hours

patterns.pain: Too much time wasted on manual troubleshooting models in production
patterns.arize_solution: Proactive monitoring catches issues before they escalate
patterns.quote: Arize would literally stop us from working weekends. By catching issues sooner, I would get so much of my life back.

patterns.pain: Data scientists spending majority of time debugging vs building
patterns.arize_solution: Self-serve debugging tools let DS focus on high-value work

patterns.pain: LLM prompt iteration is slow and lacks visibility
patterns.arize_solution: Prompt tracing and evaluation accelerates iteration cycles

increase_revenue.description: Increase revenue through better model performance

patterns.pain: Missed ad spend / revenue from model degradation
patterns.arize_solution: Prevent revenue-impacting model failures with monitoring
patterns.quote: $10m / month in automated ad allocation - need to ensure models perform

patterns.pain: Poor recommendations/matching leads to lost business
patterns.arize_solution: Monitor recommendation quality and relevance metrics
patterns.quote: When we don't place candidates, we don't get paid. Arize helps ensure our matching algorithms perform.

patterns.pain: Customer churn from poor AI/ML-powered experiences
patterns.arize_solution: Monitor customer-facing models to ensure quality experience

patterns.pain: LLM-powered products delivering poor responses hurts conversion
patterns.arize_solution: LLM quality monitoring ensures AI assistants deliver value

reduce_cost.description: Reduce costs through efficiency and avoiding build-vs-buy

patterns.pain: Building internal monitoring creates technical debt
patterns.quote: They don't want to waste time building a solution, then acquiring technical debt

patterns.pain: Can't retain ML talent without proper tooling
patterns.arize_solution: Modern ML tooling helps attract and retain talent

patterns.pain: LLM token costs spiraling without visibility
patterns.arize_solution: Token usage monitoring and cost optimization
Unified platform for MLOps and LLMOps
patterns.quote: Need unified platform to do both, MLOps and LLMOps

llm_specific_patterns.pain: Trouble with evaluations on LLMs - numeric vs thumbs up/down
llm_specific_patterns.solution: Arize LLM evaluation framework with customizable metrics

llm_specific_patterns.pain: Cosine similarity metrics not meeting targets
llm_specific_patterns.solution: RAG retrieval quality monitoring and optimization

llm_specific_patterns.pain: Teams need visibility into agent workflows

urgency_triggers: Executive mandate to improve model performance by specific date
Teams working weekends debugging production issues
Cost of delay - revenue at risk each day without solution
Current vendor (Fiddler, homegrown) breaking under pressure

Buy vs build - avoid technical debt
